TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StringFreezingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class StringFreezingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class StringFreezingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Freezes a string literal when creating native images using the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md).

span.span: Freezes a string literal when creating native images using the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类已弃用在.NET Framework 3.5 版 Service Pack 1 (SP1) 和更高版本。The class has been deprecated in the .NET Framework version 3.5 Service Pack 1 (SP1) and later versions. 冻结的字符串是一个字符串文本对象，适用于托管堆和已序列化为由本机映像[Ngen.exe （本机映像生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md)。A frozen string is a string literal object that is compatible with the managed heap and has been serialized into a native image by the [Ngen.exe (Native Image Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/ngen-exe-native-image-generator.md). 特性，您可以通过预分配字符串文本，在本机映像生成过程中，而不在运行时优化您的代码。The attribute allows you to optimize your code by pre-allocating string literals during native image generation rather than at run time. 字符串文本已被冻结后，代码可以只是指在本机映像中使用的地址的字符串。After a string literal has been frozen, code can simply refer to the string using the address in the native image. 必须在程序集级别上应用。The must be applied on the assembly level. 请注意，公共语言运行时 (CLR) 不会卸载任何已冻结的字符串，因为在堆中的任何对象的本机映像可能引用冻结字符串。Note that the common language runtime (CLR) cannot unload any native image that has a frozen string because any object in the heap might refer to the frozen string. 因此，应使用类仅在包含该冻结的字符串的本机映像被广泛共享的情况下。Therefore, you should use the class only in cases where the native image that contains the frozen string is shared heavily. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何应用对程序集。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the to an assembly. [!code-csharp[Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.StringFreezingAttribute/vb/example.vb#1)]
